channel.title: Projects on Josh Seligman
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Josh Seligman

item.title: Fork-inator
item.description: Neovim plugin that manages the execution of background processes during development.

item.title: Nebula Metrics
item.description: System resource monitor for Linux systems.

item.title: Nexus Compiler
item.description: Compiler for a custom language grammar that targets 6502 opcodes and RISC-V assembly.

item.title: jOSh
item.description: Operating system that manages and executes programs and handles operations related to a virtual file system.

item.title: GoVM
item.description: Virtual scalar ARM processor and assembler.

item.title: Digital Passport
item.description: Social media web application that connects users and inspires them to travel and explore the world.

item.title: May I Have Your Attention, Please?
item.description: Application that uses a Cascade classifier for object detection of one’s eyes and displays the data to promote increased attention spans in the digital world.
